components/f/tags/sale-saving: {{#if price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value}} {{lang "products.saving_percentage"}} {{toInt (multiply (divide (subtract price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value price.without_tax.value) price.non_sale_price_without_tax.value)100)}}% {{/if}} {{#if price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value}} {{lang "products.saving_percentage"}} {{toInt (multiply (divide (subtract price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value price.with_tax.value) price.non_sale_price_with_tax.value)100)}}% {{/if}}
components/f/tags/sale-tag: {{lang 'products.on_sale'}} {{#if theme_settings.show_percentage_saving}} {{> components/f/tags/sale-saving price=price}} {{/if}}
